verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You may have the joy-bells ringing in your heart, And a peace that from you never will depart; Walk the straight and narrow way, Live for Jesus ev'ry day, He will keep the joy-bells ringing in your heart.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Love of Jesus in its fullness you may know, And this love to those around you sweetly show; Words of kindness always say, Deeds of mercy do each day, Then He’ll keep the joy-bells ringing in your heart.
